#summary Networked Variable api

=Networked Variable (nv)=
nsdci/dcicommon/nv.c

==Introduction==
The Networked Variable api (nv) is used to stream key-value updates to remote clients. It is an in-memory array on multiple servers.  The array is networked, so a set or update on the origin server is reflected on the clients.
